meanings.definition: The thin, hard covering at the tip of a finger.
meanings.sent1: I painted my fingernails with pink polish.
meanings.sent2: She broke her fingernail while opening a can.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to catch the laser pointer dot with its tiny fingernail.
meanings.sent4: His attention to detail was as sharp as a fingernail.
meanings.sent5: The sound of her tapping her fingernail on the table echoed in the room.

meanings.definition: To scratch or scrape with the fingernails.
meanings.sent1: I accidentally fingernailed the surface while trying to open the package.
meanings.sent2: She would often fingernail the itchy mosquito bites.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly threatened to fingernail his friend if he didn't stop teasing him.
meanings.sent4: The car keys were just out of reach, so she had to fingernail them closer.
meanings.sent5: The chef carefully fingernailed the excess dough off the pastry before baking it.
